meanings.definition: A rosette or knot of ribbons worn in a hat as a badge.
meanings.sent1: The soldier proudly displayed his cockade on his hat during the parade.
meanings.sent2: She added a colorful cockade to her hat for the special event.
meanings.sent3: The cockade on his hat was so big, it looked like a mini bouquet.
meanings.sent4: Her hat stood out in the crowd with the vibrant cockade perched on top.
meanings.sent5: The cockade on the hat was like a cheerful little flower blooming in the sun.

meanings.definition: A badge or ornament worn on the hat.
meanings.sent1: The cockade on his hat symbolized his allegiance to the group.
meanings.sent2: She carefully pinned the cockade to her hat before the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The cockade on his hat seemed to wink mischievously at everyone passing by.
meanings.sent4: The cockade on her hat was a shining beacon in the sea of plain headwear.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the cockade on the hat caught everyone's eye.
